articles.title: India beat South Korea to win bronze in Asian U18 volleyball championships - Business Standard
articles.description: India defeated South Korea 32 to finish third and claim the bronze medal in the 2022 Asian Boys U18 Volleyball Championship
articles.content:
India defeated South Korea 3-2 to finish third and claim the bronze medal in the 2022 Asian Boys' U18 Volleyball Championship here on Monday.
